unnormalised: Barabor, mhaka neurology-cho anubhav sangcho aslo, khas korun migraine-ache babtint. Tuka khobor asa, to dhad-dhad korun dukhta to doke dukhi je sodanch astach? Haim, to ekuch. Mhaka tem jevnna 16 vorshanche umarak astana suru zale.
normalised: Baraabor, maka neurology vixim, khaskarun migraines sambhandit mhozo anubhav vanttun gheunk zai asa. Tumkam khobor asa, thodthoddit dukhtole tem dokem-dukhi jem soddunk soddna? Ho, tem ekuch. Maka solla vorsanchem axilam tenna thaun tem zatam.

unnormalised: Poile, hanv mhoje familiche doctor, Dr. Sharma-k gelem, konn mhaje lakshanam aiklya uprant, suuchit kelem ki eka neurologist-ak bhett. Tika tharav aslo ki tem fakt tan-nirmann zaleli doke dukhi nastana kitem-i asunk xakta. Tanne mhaka AIIMS, Delhi-ntl Dr. Gupta-k referral dilem, konn neurology-nt vixhex zannkar asa. Appointment-ak vat pollounk lagpacho vell khupuch axillo, sumar 3 mhoine!
normalised: Poilem, hanv mhojea gharchoa doctorak, doctor Sharma-k ghelem, ani, mhojea loxnank aikolea uprant, tanne maka ek neurologistak bhettunk suchoilem. Tankam dislem ki ten stress-ak lagun zatole dokem-dukhi poros odik astolem mhunn. Tanne maka A-I-I-M-S, Delhi hangache doctor Gupta-k referral dilem, zankam neurology-chem vixex zannvai asa. Appointment-ak ravop ekdom bekar axillem, sumar teen mhoine!

unnormalised: Dr. Gupta-n khub poriksha keli, ek MRI (â‚¹8000!) aslo, fakt kitem-i gambhir na mhunn therovnk. Dev bore korun, soglle niyall normal aile. Tanne mhaka chronic migraines mhunn nidan kelen ani thode meds suchovle: Amitriptyline 25mg ani Propranolol 40mg. Tanne kaim jivan stylant bodlop korunk sanglem, jevnna caffeine kamikorpak ani niyomit nid ghevpak- korunk fattim fuddem zalem mhunn sangunk zata, barabor na?
normalised: Doctor Gupta-n ekdom tests keleo, zantun ek M-R-I (rupee atth hozar!) astalilem, kiteakui gambhir asa mhunn soddun divnk. Devan dhanyavad, sogllem normal ailem. Tannem maka chronic migraines asa mhunn nidan kelem ani sumar vostu sangleo: Amitriptyline panchvis milligram ani Propranolol challis milligram. Tannem jivitachea pod'dotinchea badlanchi suchovnni keli, kaffeen kamim korop ani regular nhid gheunk - korunk sopem, mhunnunk sopem, sori?

unnormalised: Meds-an thodo faido kelo, jevnna, ek poryant 4 pavti asle to 2 pavti kamikelo. Punn mhaka te hatyari doke dukhi zatali. Mhaje neuro-n mhaka Botox injections korunk sangli. Ekdom bhirant dista, mhaka khobor asa, punn dishta kaim lokank tem fayeachin asa. Dor injection-ak Rs. 25000 dor session-ak kharch yeta!
normalised: Voshtam thoddem upkaarik zale, sumar chovrangenta thaun ek satollean don fautti itlen kamim zale. Punn maka te ghathok dokem-dukhi aile. Mhojea neuro-n Botox injection-chem prayatn korunk suchoilem. Bhirantikar dista, maka khobor asa, punn dakhoun dilem ki tem sumar lokank upkaarik asta mhunn. Dor injection-ak rupee panchvis hozar prottek session-ak kharch yeta!

unnormalised: Hanve thode alternative therapies sodunk suru kele. Hanve acupuncture kelem, je khorem sangta zalear, tannem khas kai kelen na. Punn mhaka dislem yoga ani meditation-an tan sambhallpak khup madad keli, je mhaka ek mukhel karan dista. Ani, mhoje doctoren sanglen doke dukhechi diary sambhallpak. Tariko jevnna 10/10/2023 dakovtat ki mhaka khup gambhir zatak asto mhunn.
normalised: Hanvem sumar veglle upcharui sodunk survat keli. Hanvem acupuncture-chi try keli, jem satyan, chodd kainch upkaarik zalem na. Punn hanvem sodun kaddlem ki yoga ani meditation stress samballunk zait upkaarik zata, jem maka ek mukhel trigger dista. Toxench, mhojea doctoran dokem-dukhiche diary samballunk suchoilem. Tariqo zoxe dusrea october don hozar ani tevis dakhoun dita ki maka bhirantikar dokem-dukhi axili.

unnormalised: Ahar pan khup mukhel zago vhaita. Mhaka kollun ailem ki khup processed jevn jevun ani purnen udok pivunhim vostu kharab kortat. Atam, hanv santulit ahar jevunk proyathn kortam khup follan ani bhajiyanchea sangata. Ani, MSG-chea add vochpachem khup gorjechem asa.
normalised: Aharui ek vhodd bago vharta. Maka koll'llem ki chodd processed jevonn jevn ani purtem udok piyena zalear vostu odik vaitt zatat mhunn. Atam, hanv somtolit ahar jevnk prayatn kortam zantun bori foll ani bhajpala asta. Toxench, M-S-G thaun pois ravop zait mhotvachem.

unnormalised: Haim, mhaji neurology-chi yatra atam poryant. Chronic migraines sambhallpache dukhkiche asa, punn bore mandavni ani jivan stylant bodol ghevn, tem sambhallunk favo asa. Zaka doke dukhechi taklif asa, tannem svatach nidan korunk favo na, voch eka neurologist-ak bhett, bhai! Te tuka khobor kortole kitem chalu asa ani bore mandavnechem vostu sodpache sambhallpache tunchi lakshanam.
normalised: Hea, ho mhozo neurology-cho pravas atam poriant. Chronic migraines samballop ek tras, punn baraabor upcharachea yojnechea ani jivitachea badalchea, tem samballunk zata. Tum dokem-dukhichea trasan dukhta zalear, svotachich nidan korunk nant, voch ani ek neurologist-ak bhett, bhai! Te tumkam modot korunk xoktat kiteak cholta mhunn ani baraabor pod'dot sodunk tumche loxnn samballunk.
